sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Kurdish: Theerê digirîn ji bo edaletê her tiştî bû - pir ji bo qefesa rayedaran.
backtrans: The crying was everything for justice - so much for the stage of authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Kurdish: Biryara rejîmê rojeva binavê adumb dike.
backtrans: The decision of the regime is adumbed to the bottom of the hand.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Kurdish: Civat li ser derbasbûna reformên pir hewceyê xemgîn bû.
backtrans: The community was sorry about the passage of high reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Kurdish: Tankê difikirin ku kaxezek ku lêborîna xwe ya cezayê sermiyanê derxistiye weşandin.
backtrans: Tanks thinking a piece of paper that has issued a capital penalty apologies.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Kurdish: Aught ji mafê derbasdariyê hate hiştin
backtrans: Aught was left of the right of validity

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Kurdish: Serokkomar wezîrên xwe ji ber ku piştevaniya dijberiya mimkûnê ji bo plansaziya aborî ya xwe li ber zengilê bû.
backtrans: The president of their ministers was because of supporting possible opposition for its economic plan in front of the ring.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Kurdish: Hilbijêr hatin qefilandin da ku fatûreya derbasbûyî bibînin.
backtrans: The voters were crushed to see the passage of the bill.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Kurdish: Parêzerê Narrationê Discursive jûriyê şil kir.
backtrans: Discursive Discursive Discussion lawyer wet the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Kurdish: Bloka YE li dijî ferasetek bûyerê ya tedbîrên dijî-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block is against anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Kurdish: Eulogyek Fulsome ji hêla şîreta Sly ve hate radest kirin.
backtrans: A fulsome eulog was handed over by SLY advice.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Kurdish: Ajansa Gig-Aboriyê biryar da ku bertekên drav bide!
backtrans: The Gig-Economic agency decided to pay the reactions!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Kurdish: Endamên Tevgera Revolutionaryoreşa Anti-Droomrat, pezên xwe li hêzê barandin!
backtrans: Members of the Anti-Droomrat Revolution Revolutionary Revolution, shooting their peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Kurdish: Xeydkar bi dilşikestî biryar da ku bi kolonyalîst re şer bikin.
backtrans: The environment decently decided to fight colonistically.
